name: CTC UNCLASS Remote Hosted Desktops (URHD)
short_description: Concurrent Technologies Corporation (CTC) provides the customer the ability to access their applications and data through a user-definable virtual workspace, full virtual desktop, mobile cloud or a light-weight client from many different client types including PCs, Tablets and Smartphones.
long_description: Concurrent Technologies Corporation (CTC) provides the customer the ability to access their applications and data through a user-definable virtual workspace, full virtual desktop, mobile cloud or a light-weight client from many different client types including PCs, Tablets and Smartphones.
